resources.string: 1. At a conference, 12 members shook hands with each other before & after the meeting. How many total number of hand shakes occurred?
2. The day after the day after tomorrow is four days before Monday. What day is it today?
3. 6121135 is to flame as 21215120 is to ?
4. Forest is to tree as tree is to ?
Result will automatically display here if you wish
